_header: A lady that was so fair and bright
Subjects: Virgin Mary, songs in honour of
_description: A macaronic song in honour of the Virgin Mary — seven quatrains

BodAsh1393.First Lines:
A lady þat was so feyre & briȝtvelut maris
                        stellaBrowȝt forth ihesu full of miȝt…
